__TOC__

* Contact: https://launchpad.net/~kwidany

* Make: Samsung

* Brand: P560-Pro

* Model: P7450 Paris

* Website: http://it-business.samsung.de/products/detail_article.aspx?guid=fee924d9-2451-4745-b2a4-88d815fe9891&e1=products&e2=Notebook+PC&e3=P560-Pro-Serie

=== Current Issues ===
* Some Fn-Keys do not work (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/hal/+bug/355542|#355542]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/hal-info/+bug/338182|#338182]]</nowiki>).

* --(Laptop does not shutdown properly when usplash is active. A workaround ist to switch to another console with Strg + Alt + F1 during shutdown.)-- (solved with Ubuntu 9.10)

* --(After a reboot the Laptop hangs at BIOS screen (took about 2 minutes then boots) - FIX: manually remove ricoh_mmc module.)
* Brightness keys do not work (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/338173|#338173]]</nowiki>). A workaround is to use ''smartdimmer'' [2].

* Ambient light sensor does not work.

* Some Models with 4GB of RAM probably need the kernel option ''mem=4096M'' (<nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/272530|#272530]]</nowiki>).

=== Miscellaneous ===

==== Hidden BIOS options ====
On the BIOS Setup screen press Fn + F11 followed by Fn + F12. Press the left or right key. Then a menu 'Intel' appears with several items. Be ''very'' careful with changing them.

==== Links ====

* http://what-ho.posterous.com/linux-hotkey-support-on-samsung-laptops
* http://code.google.com/p/easy-slow-down-manager/

=== Notes ===

1. Tested on Jaunty 64-bit <code>Linux P560 2.6.31-19-generic #56-Ubuntu SMP Thu Jan 28 02:39:34 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux</code>

2. With drivers from Nvidia ('''nvidia-glx-180''' package)

3. Module ''uvcvideo'' needs option ''quirks=16''

4. Tested on Lucid 64-bit <code>Linux P560 2.6.32-22-generic #33-Ubuntu SMP Wed Apr 28 13:28:05 UTC 2010 x86_64 GNU/Linux</code>

5. With drivers from Nvidia ('''nvidia-current''' package)
